system.description:
At 10th level you gain the ability to maintain a number of undead minions created using your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.jrfdlhcpszjjju7o]{Create Minion} ability. You can maintain a number of minions with a total CR equal to or less than your wizard level, although no individual minion may have a CR equal to or greater than half your wizard level.

For example, at 10th level you would be able to maintain two CR 4 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.fflwmb3goeb2pvm2]{Banshees} and a CR 2 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.hf8g5so53j70nd60]{Ghast}; or you could maintain three CR 3 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.qzmx2i182oz87kp1]{Mummies} and a CR 1 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.dgfs5xu1ezk0b1cz]{Ghoul}.
